mapper.select: SELECT u.eu_user_id "usesrId", u.eu_user_name "userName", u.eu_sex "sex", u.eu_birthday "birthday", u.eu_mobile "phoneNo", u.eu_identity_code "idNo", u.eu_email "email", u.eu_address "address", u.eu_status "status" FROM easybuy_user u

SELECT eo_id "orderId", eo_user_id "userId", eo_user_name "userName", eo_user_address "address", eo_create_time "createTime", eo_cost "cost", eo_status "orderStatus", eo_type "orderType" FROM easybuy_order
SELECT ec_id "commentId", ec_content "content", ec_create_time "createTime", ec_reply "reply", ec_reply_time "replyTime", ec_nick_name "nickName" FROM easybuy_comment
SELECT p.EP_ID "productId", p.EP_DESCRIPTION "description", p.EP_FILE_NAME "fileName", p.EP_NAME "productName", p.EP_PRICE "price", p.EP_STOCK "stock" FROM EASYBUY_PRODUCT p
SELECT c.EPC_ID "categoryId", c.EPC_NAME "categoryName", c.EPC_PARENT_ID "parentId" FROM EASYBUY_PRODUCT_CATEGORY c
SELECT n.EN_CONTENT "content", n.EN_CREATE_TIME "createTime", n.EN_ID "newsId", n.EN_TITLE "title" FROM EASYBUY_NEWS n
